column1: Yerraguntla is a Leading Industrial town in YSR Kadapa district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is located in Yerraguntla mandal of Kadapa revenue division.
Yerraguntla is located at 14.6333°N 78.5333°E﻿ / 14.6333; 78.5333. It has an average elevation of 152 meters (501 feet).
